review: Wasn't expecting to have to buy Net Flix after 30 day trial.  Also being a prime subscriber, You have to pay for some of the movies.
author: Laura Gayle

review: The stick works well. I have some trouble connecting with my IPhone 6 to use a remote.  Otherwise installation was very easy.
author: Ronald Collett

review: Works flawlessly and provides a great experience for myself and my father who uses it just as much as I do!
author: Cody M

review: Great product. Very easy to use.
author: kerri flanagan

review: BOOM... FireTV is the real deal.  Calling all cord cutters...
author: Iman S Watson

review: Setup took about 10 minutes, then accessed hulu and netflix a short time later.  I got the remote without voice recognition because I have the Fire Tv box with the remote and it rarely understands me.  So, with all things considered and not utilizing any other product to compare it, I am very pleased with my purchase and definitely recommend Fire TV (box or stick).
author: LJLJ

review: Very happy with my purchase. Had problem with sound. Was a quick fix by adjusting settings.
author: Patricia I. Pruett
